name: Quality Assurance Elf
description:
The elves have been becoming increasingly careless while wrapping presents. It's your job as the Quality Assurance Elf to make sure their mistakes don't make it out. Find the torn presents and click to destroy them.

Disclaimer: The HTML version has some bugs, If you run the game and click off you will need to refresh the page or else the input breaks. The audio also artifacts sometimes.
